body.content:
Hello Dear,
Thanks for your reply and may God be with you and every members of your
family as i pray to know you more better through this my second email to
you,

Dear i am very happy to receive your reply and i will like both of us to
know each other very first before i give you more details regarding to this
issue,

However you tried in replying back to me and i will like you to send more
details about you to me because is all about my late fathers money and i
will transfer the money to any account you can provide for the transfer
after knowing you more better,

Reply back to me with your phone number and scan copy of your photos with
your address to enable me to know you well before introducing you to the
bank as my foreign partner who will receive the money to his account for
investment as my late father advised me before his sudden death,

Thanks and remain bless as i wait for your urgent reply,
Yours Felix Damians
